Hello,
My question is related to constant temperature
process. I  know we can carry out a reaction at
constant temperature if we set energy="off" in a
reactor so that the energy equations are not
integrated. But my question is how do I calculate the
total energy change in a constant temperature process.
I need to calculate the total energy evolved if I
carry out a certain reaction at constant temperature?

Surinder
